articles.title: Murders of 2 girls and 2 young women in Canada in the 1970s linked to American serial rapist - CBS News
articles.description: Police said Gary Allen Srery might also be linked to other unsolved murders and sexual assaults in Western Canada.
articles.content: Canadian police announced Friday they have linked the deaths of two 14-year-old girls and two young women nearly 50 years ago to a now deceased U.S. fugitive who hid in Canada from the mid 1970s to t… [+4639 chars]
